headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Pursuit Series and More
content:
LS Car Meet Members with a knack for crafting slick escape routes will earn Double Rewards for outmaneuvering their fellow drivers and the LSPD as part of the Pursuit Series this week.

Plus, Siege Mentality places a small team of defenders armed to the teeth against a determined group of attackers attempting to breach the holdout. Whatever side youâ€™re on, both teams earn 2X GTA$ and RP for playing Siege Mentality this week.
